code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant API
    participant Analytics as UserAnalyticsService
    participant Cache as Redis Cache
    participant DB as PostgreSQL
    participant EventBus as Event Bus
    participant Worker as Background Worker

    Note over User,Worker: Real-time Activity Tracking
    User->>API: User Action
    API->>EventBus: Publish user.activity event
    EventBus->>Analytics: Event Handler
    Analytics->>Analytics: Buffer Event

    Note over Analytics: Buffer reaches threshold
    Analytics->>DB: Batch Insert Events

    Note over User,Worker: Analytics Query Flow
    User->>API: Request Metrics
    API->>Analytics: getEngagementMetrics()

    Analytics->>Cache: Check Cache
    alt Cache Hit
        Cache-->>Analytics: Return Cached Data
        Analytics-->>API: Return Metrics
    else Cache Miss
        Analytics->>DB: Query Raw Data
        DB-->>Analytics: Return Results
        Analytics->>Analytics: Calculate Metrics
        Analytics->>Cache: Store in Cache
        Analytics-->>API: Return Metrics
    end

    API-->>User: Display Metrics

    Note over Worker,DB: Background Aggregation
    Worker->>Analytics: processAggregations('hourly')
    Analytics->>DB: Aggregate User Activity
    Analytics->>DB: Update Aggregate Tables
    Analytics->>Cache: Invalidate Stale Cache
    Analytics->>DB: Cleanup Old Data
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
